title: Windows XP
description:
Windows XP Support:
Declaration:[/b] Some might say that Microsoft no longer supports Windows XP. Well, that's true! Then what's new in this release? Here you go:

- Added: Security Update for Internet Explorer 8 for Windows XP (KB2964358). Released: 01.05.2014
- Updated: Windows Malicious Software Removal Tool - November 2014 (KB890830). Released: 13.01.2015
- Updated: Adobe Flash Player ActiveX Control (16.0.0.257). Released: 13.01.2015

* Hashes of ISO file (January 2015):
CRC32: 1536AEEF
MD5: C536A39EEA4E91B4E6CEB8A2C6B32BAB
SHA-1: 92549CDA62F952ED8427E3ECCDE80F9F15399E34

* Looking for the serial number?

=======================================================

The describtion and the .iso in this torrent are coming streight from Maher's website ( http://www.nomaher.com/forum/index.php?topic=133.0 ). Nothing is changed. I've added an official themes installer published by microsoft. I've also included a screenshot of Maher's current XP page mostly because of the hashes. This way you'll know that the hashes I quoted are the real deal. You can also check the .iso hashes.
Maher's "Remove MDW" patch is also included in the torrent.
NO ARCHIVES, NO PASSWORDS, JUST THE ISO, PATCH AND THEMES!!!


Please seed this after you download it! I can't seed for very long because my upload speeds are quite low.

Enjoy!
